SEARCH
Package org.example

Class Book

java.lang.Object
org.example.Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents a book in the library. This class provides methods to access the book's details such as title, author, ISBN, and its availability.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Book(String title, String author, String ISBN, boolean isAvailable)
    Constructs a new Book with the specified title, author, ISBN, and availability.

  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, String ISBN, boolean isAvailable)
      Constructs a new Book with the specified title, author, ISBN, and availability.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      ISBN - The International Standard Book Number of the book.
      isAvailable - The availability status of the book in the library.
